comments.html: The Aruba-CX VM must have at least some EVPN -- we have EVPN configuration templates in netlab. How much of that works? I'll be able to tell you after writing EVPN integration tests ;)
comments.name: Ivan Pepelnjak

comments.html: You are right, unfortunately VXLAN+EVPN+VSX is not supported on AOS-CX Virtual. But let's hope that sooner or later it will be supported. ;)
comments.name: Sasso Stefano

comments.html: About footnote 1. Unfortunately in case of Aruba-CX the most important for me features do not work in a VM: VSX and EVPN
comments.name: tommyd
